body: p. 152-173: Just like a certain someone
You sure are a understanding guy, it's just like me, I hatr ntr but love Lilith and they seen to love making ntr,  so who am I to complain
Man it's hard being a Takeda Hiromitsu fan who hates NTR. He clearly loves drawing it and who am I to keep the man from what he loves. That said, God DAMN do I love his NTR-less work. 9/10

@Yoshitsunecr I don't think the student council president one was vanilla either, it was started with blackmail and forced sexual interactions after all. Just it's because this is hentai she happened to be a pervert like all the other girls in these stories and just lost her brave bravado quicker than the average person would. Cause you know.. Hentai.

Still disappointed that the really perverted girl from the sixth and last story didn't get to experience anal in the end. I mean that was the only reason she turned down so many people in the end wasn't it? I've never heard of a man against anal, she clearly wanted it and yet the dude copped out and used her pussy instead. Why not just do both?

Hmm...The realistic answer is probably that the artist just couldn't be fucked to draw the anal scene.
Besides the trainer one (that was mind-break), every chapter was vanilla Right?
WOW. If only succubi were real. And thirsty. :p
Takeda hiromitsu is the artist, all the ntr stuff belongs to mizuryu kei or alice no takarabako
this is not his work. IT YnD

It's weird to read something normal from Takeda Hiromitsu after that all NTR/Mind Break hentai and now i readed Sister Breeder and this Tsundero. I wonder when he do more something like this, because right now he is on NTR mania i think :D
